headline: Wabtec Union Pacific Deal Highlights Rail Modernization And Valuation Tension
summary: Wabtec (NYSE:WAB) and Union Pacific agreed a $1.2b program to modernize 1,700 locomotives. The deal is described as the largest locomotive modernization project in rail industry history. The agreement focuses on fuel efficiency, reliability, and new digital capabilities across a major portion of Union Pacific’s fleet. For you as an investor looking at NYSE:WAB, this agreement highlights how the company’s core rail technology and services sit at the heart of freight rail operations. Wabtec’s...
